column2: 음 이번에는 작년 Cherry Bomb에 비해 강렬한 임펙트이 부족하네요 다만 세계적으로 공격하자로 이런 아쉬운 방향으로 가자고 된 것이지만 역시 어딘가 무리 너무있는 느낌이 부정 할 수 없어 그들은 아직 젊은니까 좀 그 젊음을 나타낸 신선하고 세련된 노래를 불러 줘야한다고 생각하고 이것이라고 BTS의 IDOL에 져 버릴거야 세련된 것은 잘 알고 있었지만 거기에 좀 어린 소년 특유의 활기찬 부분 이랄까 개성도 도입했으면 좋았다는 게 이번 그들의 신곡을 듣고 소감은 솔직히 까 그 점 BTS는 어린 소년 특유의 천진난 만함 할까 활기찬 조금 悪乗り 느낌을 음악으로도 성능도 잘 도입하고 충분히 개성이 빛나고 있었다고 생각하고 IDOL은 지금도 머릿속에 강하게 남아 있어요 즉 임팩트면에서는 BTS의 IDOL 쪽이 이기고있는 것은 아닐까 나는 생각 하네

second of the video will counted a view it s available for Spotify but it doesn t work on Youtube 2 Watch the video in HD 720p at least Youtube logic is that user will watch the video in the most comfortable for their eye quality We all know how 360 240 144p are suck and if we can afford we are always trying to put it in higher quality If u can afford stream in HD if ur device hasn t HD or ur internet connection is low then 480p is allowed 3 DON T skip stop or rewind the video 4 The sound on ur phone should be more then 50 u can use earphone on it but the sound should stay more then 50 U can mute the sound on ur laptop and PC but be sure that the volume on Youtube is more then 50 5 Before rewatching the same video u should DELETE the watching and searching history the watching history is THE BROWSING HISTORY and the searching history is COOKIES 6 LOG OUT after the first watching of the video bc from one acc u can watch the same video ONLY ONCE in hour But if u have a few account then delete the whole history after watching the video log out from one acc and log in another one close a tab and open a new one and then research this MV again for rewatching Don t forget to leave comment and like 7 STREAM MANUALLY Don t use the playlist and loop when u have a free time for watching the video on Youtube Playlists and loop are the main reason of freezing the view for a long time also not all of view from them will be counted by Youtibe system only 10 30 By using playlist and loop u are just proving that u are LISTENING TO THE SOUND FROM THE VIDEO but NOT WATCHING IT AT ALL And Youtube is a VIDEO portal where u should WWATCH THE VIDEOS not a music portal like Spotify Remember that Youtube like to delete unfaithful view 8 DON T USE multiple tab or incognito mode they are counted a SPAM and ur view will be deleted for sure 9 Don t replay the video or refresh the page for rewatching ur view will be counted a SPAM and will be deleted for sure 10 DON T SKIP THE ADS They are counted a part of the video and if u will skip them u actually will skip the video and ur view will not counted by Youtube 10 Don t change the speed of the video 11 Use different browser Mozilla Firefox Opera Google Chrome and etc account internet connection Wi Fi and mobile data device PC TV phone laptop for streaming of the video these thing will helping to increase the view 12 Comment Like Share by the video on social medium and with friend 13 AND NOW THERE IS THE MOST IMPORTANT RULE you CAN T REWATCH the same video again and again without any gap If u will rewatch Not Today on repeat again and again ur view will be counted a SPAM and deleted for sure

Youtube ha been stricter with vi3w counting these day i must say especially with music video and after some big kpop group increasing vi3ws dramatically in the first 24hrs Bts Blackpink Twice Remember people More vi3w more money youtube had to pay I don t exactly know how they count the vi3w but for sure those group fandom i mentioned did suffered the same a nctzens Vi3w freezing hour after hour and even got deleted a lot but you know why they still had that incredible amount of vi3ws even when shit happened like this That s because their fandom are huge By huge i literally mean HUGE Increasing the vi3ws is the fandom first goal especially the one that can t support their group with streaming on Korean music site and or buying album So with the strong delicate and that much people ready to str3am all day of course even if many of them didn t know the right way to str3am nctzen is no doubt still yet reach that level Many people assumed that this problem only happened with sm artist no It happened with every video that increased million of vi3ws in the first hour especially with music video However video with low vi3ws under 1000 vi3ws didn t seem to get applied the same rule a the high vi3ws one i heard some said that you can watch half the video but youtube could still count yours a one vi3w Ridiculous i know but with trending mv nowadays where billion of vi3ws aren t seem hard to get example despacito they will do everything to stop increasing the vi3w After all more vi3ws more money

Hello NCTZENS Let u continue to support our boy Str m properly Here s how Sign in using your yt acct Watch at least in 360p DO NOT SKIP AD Watch until the end of the music video YT volume must at least be more than 50 Delete history and cooky from time to time Do not hit the replay button Otherwise your view will not be counted The view count will freeze because YT will consider it a spam You can make a playlist But put it on loop and shuffle Then add at least two other music video Streaming manually is still better though But when you are busy you can just use playlist Thank you so much for reading This is a big comeback for NCT Streaming their mv and their album to be released later this 6pm KST is the least that we can do a fan They worked hard a lot especially for this comeback We should give back our love in return Again pls support our boy Lovelots 💚

Honestly both MVs were really great yes I know that they used the same scene for some part but there were scene that were in different part a the vid a well a new scene but I prefer this one The Eng Ver MV focused more on the aesthetic while in this one it really highlight the member and focus on them As for the certain scene being in different part of the vid I really like how they placed them because imo the transition were much smoother not rlly sure if this is the word I m looking for lmao a opposed to the Eng Ver and I really like that In the Eng Ver everything in the MV seemed to happen v fast which gave it a more powerful not sure if this is the right word to describe again lol impact and also complimented the whole aesthetic there On the other hand this version wa more chill yet it still keep that powerful impact I wa thinking that maybe I found this ver different from the other because I m used to the other ver but I played the Eng Ver while this MV wa playing and what I found out wa that this MV doe seem more chill Like it still ha that impact like I said before lmao I m starting to use like a lot sdkljakjfd but it s just more chill lol I m being repetitive It s most likely because it compliment the language Korean they re singing here It s the same song but when sung in different language it give off different vibe causing difference in the MVs the feeling it give off and the actual difference If you compare the Eng translation of the Korean Ver to the actual Eng Ver the Eng Ver boast the idea of being rich and living that rich life while the Korean Ver also point out the value of who they are a a person and is a tad bit humbler ex Ice out both my wrist now I can barely see the time v To all the people that dropped me please stop hitting my line Hopped out the coupe the sky is the roof my whole team ball We never lose hundred all blue we do what we do v I fly to the sky paint painting in my mind we never lose Surpassing the limit we do what we do Overall it s up to personal preference which MV or Ver one like I just wanted to give my opinion which prolly don t make sense lol out since Regular is such a bop and the MVs were v interesting to watch
